Hi There

I’m a Full Stack Developer and .

The digital world is crazy, but isn’t that craziness awesome? I strive to find the best and most efficient solutions to the most complex of problems.

Not only do I apply this to development, but to design and marketing as well. Do you love tech and Star Wars too?

Discover Me

How you doin’?

Hi Stranger!

I’ve been developing and designing since 2010. It’s incredible how everything has changed since then. I started off with a traditional frontend stack (HTML, CSS, jQuery) and backend (PHP and MYSQL).

After a couple of years, I’ve migrated to an awesome frontend stack Vue.js, React. And the most beautiful backend there is Python, Django. I dig Node.js and Express too... Feel free to see my complete tech stack here.

When you need to get something done, you also know what skills are required to complete the task. I put my heart and mind into my work, so check out my skills and don’t forget to shoot me an email.

My version of a Short Story

My career and experience

I started developing in 2010 but decided to major in Business. I really wanted to understand the “business” side of things to have a better scope and understanding of real life. Soft skills are equally important as hard skills, so check out my version of a short story. See my full experience here.

Swipe Right

Some programs I use

One Program to Rule Them All

The first thing I do every morning is open Station, I fell in love with their slogan “One app to rule them all”. I add all of the apps and programs I normally use to Station and take it from there. If you choose programs wisely you can optimize and improve your work. What programs do you use?
